cells.data:
Goal: How to better communicate the essential characteristics of a new class such as to improve the agent’s learning of the new class.

Literature review:
  • Online Deep learning:
    • https://arxiv.org/pdf/1711.03705.pdf
      • adaptively changes the architecture of the neural net to accommodate the number of instances
      • Mentions the traditional online gradient descent algorithm
        • just basically gradient descent
      • (Hedge back propagation)

Steps 
  • eye-tracking based on the MNIST dataset
  • designing mnist classifier without saliency
  • designing mnist classifier with saliency
  • measure relearning-ability (however that’s measured) of original mnist classifier without saliency
  • measure relearning-ability of mnist classifier with saliency

    Samek’s Relevance Propagation
  • Can we assume that the relevance of a 
  • See if the classification performances are undisturbed by saliency reinforcements
